title: Light Support
text2: Supports basic antioxidant, brain and nerve function ⋅ Promotes circulatory function ⋅ Helps maintain healthy skin
text3:

title: Added Support
text2: Helps reduce stress ⋅ Supports mental focus ⋅ Reduce free radicals ⋅ Assists digestion regulation ⋅ Aids body’s ability to self-repair

title: Moderate Support
text2: Promotes general well-being and focus ⋅ Anxiety relief ⋅ Supports digestive balance ⋅ Reduces nausea ⋅ Lessens psychoactive effects of THC
text3:

title: Strong Support

title: Excellent Support
